document.topic_text: , inclusive, on its common stock, par value $1.00 . This dividend is payable on June 15, 2016 , to holders of record at the close of business on May 27, 2016 Today the company also declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.00 per share for the period from April 1, 2016
